content.text:
# Golden Goblet Award for Outstanding Artistic Achievement

The Golden Goblet Outstanding Artistic Achievement () is a special jury prize awarded to films in the main category of competition at the Shanghai International Film Festival.
Award Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Film !! Country
|-
| 2013 || The Major || Yuri Bykov
|-
| 2014 || Begin Again || Gregg Alexander
|-
| 2015 || The Shameless || OH Seung-uk
|-
| 2016 || HAZE || Ralston Jover
|-
| 2017 || Fault Condition ||
|-
| 2018 || Carnivores ||
|-
| 2019 || Trees Under the Sun || Dr. Biju
|}
